import React from "react"; import ReactModal from "react-modal"; import { useModal } from "../context/ModalContext"; import "../assets/sass/_modal.scss"; // SCSS 모듈 임포트 const Modal = ({ mainText, subText }) => { console.log(mainText, subText); const { isOpen, closeModal } = useModal(); return (

{mainText}

{subText}

 ); }; export default Modal;
